  • Class 
  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: namespace Instagram\Providers;
  4: 
  5: use GuzzleHttp\Client;
  6: use GuzzleHttp\HandlerStack;
  7: use Instagram\Http\Clients\AdapterInterface;
  8: use Instagram\Http\Clients\GuzzleAdapter;
  9: use Instagram\Http\Clients\MockAdapter;
 10: use League\Container\Argument\RawArgument;
 11: use League\Container\ServiceProvider\AbstractServiceProvider;
 12: use League\OAuth2\Client\Token\AccessToken;
 13: 
 14: /**
 15:  * GuzzleServiceProvider
 16:  *
 17:  * @package    Instagram
 18:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
 19:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
 20:  * @license    MIT
 21:  */
 22: class GuzzleServiceProvider extends AbstractServiceProvider
 23: {
 24:     /**
 25:      * The provides array is a way to let the container
 26:      * know that a service is provided by this service
 27:      * provider. Every service that is registered via
 28:      * this service provider must have an alias added
 29:      * to this array or it will be ignored.
 30:      *
 31:      * @var array
 32:      */
 33:     protected $provides = [
 34:         AdapterInterface::class,
 35:         HandlerStack::class
 36:     ];
 37: 
 38:     /**
 39:      * Use the register method to register items with the container via the
 40:      * protected $this->container property or the `getContainer` method
 41:      * from the ContainerAwareTrait.
 42:      *
 43:      * @return void
 44:      */
 45:     public function register()
 46:     {
 47:         $container = $this->getContainer();
 48:         $config    = $container->get('config');
 49: 
 50:         // If access token was provided, then instantiate and add to middleware
 51:         if ($config->has('access_token')) {
 52: 
 53:             $container->share(AccessToken::class)
 54:                 ->withArgument(new RawArgument(json_decode($config->get('access_token'), true)));
 55: 
 56:             $container->add('middleware.auth', function() use ($config, $container) {
 57:                 $class  = $config->get('middleware.auth');
 58:                 return $class::create($container->get(AccessToken::class));
 59:             });
 60: 
 61:             $container->add('middleware.secure', function() use ($config, $container) {
 62:                 $class  = $config->get('middleware.secure');
 63:                 return $class::create($container->get('config'));
 64:             });
 65:         }
 66: 
 67:         $container->share(HandlerStack::class, function() {
 68:             return HandlerStack::create();
 69:         });
 70: 
 71:         $this->addMiddleware();
 72: 
 73:         $container->share(Client::class)
 74:             ->withArgument(new RawArgument([
 75:                 'base_uri' => $config->get('base_uri'),
 76:                 'handler'  => $container->get(HandlerStack::class),
 77:             ]));
 78: 
 79:         if ($config->get('http_adapter') === GuzzleAdapter::class) {
 80:             $container->share(AdapterInterface::class, function() use ($container) {
 81:                 return new GuzzleAdapter($container->get(Client::class));
 82:             });
 83:         }
 84: 
 85:         if ($config->get('http_adapter') === MockAdapter::class) {
 86:             $path = realpath(__DIR__.'/../../tests/fixtures').'/';
 87:             $container->share(AdapterInterface::class, new MockAdapter($path));
 88:         }
 89:     }
 90: 
 91:     protected function addMiddleware()
 92:     {
 93:         $container = $this->getContainer();
 94:         $config    = $container->get('config');
 95:         $stack     = $container->get(HandlerStack::class);
 96: 
 97:         foreach($config->get('middleware') as $name => $item) {
 98:             $stack->push($container->get("middleware.$name"), $name);
 99:         }
100:     }
101: }
102:
